item.title: Editing markdown on the go
item.description: Editing on iOS To make it easier for me to actually use my site and put things on it, one of the thing I wanted to do was edit from whatever device I happen to be on at the time. Most of the time when an idea pops in to my head that’s going to mean my phone (iPhone 13 Pro Max) or my iPad. The options Having had a Google around for options the two they kept coming up the most were:

item.title: Hello again
item.description: It’s been a while Erm…. that’s an understatement, it’s been 5 years since I last put anything on here and it really is time I get back to it. In an effort to do that I’m looking at how to make it easier for me to update whilst I’m on the go, so expect some content around that as I progress with it, watch this space as they say…
